text: aur yoon hamane us quraan ko arabee (zabaan) ka pharamaan naazil pharamaaya aur (ai rasool) agar kaheen tumane isake baad ko tumhaare paas ilm (quraan) aa chuka un kee naphasiyaanee khvaahishon kee pairavee kar lee to (yaad rakho ki) phir khuda kee taraph se na koee tumhaara saraparast hoga na koee bachaane vaala
